text: West Coast Park Promenade offers a serene escape with a beautiful view of the coastline, extending out to Pasir Panjang Terminal and Jurong Island. The wide, well-paved walking path is perfect for cyclists, joggers, and walkers alike. A standout feature is the lookout jetty, providing a tranquil spot to take in the surroundings. The promenade is rarely crowded, making it an ideal location for a peaceful walk away from the city‚Äôs bustle. Whether you're there for exercise or a quiet moment by the sea, this promenade delivers a calming experience.

To alleviate soil erosion from the pounding of the sea waves along the West Coast Park shoreline, a seawall was built giving rise to a well-paved promenade where one could enjoy sunset evening strolls and breezy morning walks.

Cooling in the morning with interesting animals in nature!
